description: This web application can be used to query and download findings from the Outcome-Wide Exposome Association Study conducted in the Human Early Life Exposome (HELIX) project, including 586 mother-child pairs from 6 European cohorts in the UK, France, Spain, Lithuania, Norway and Greece (https://www.projecthelix.eu), with data on environmental exposures during pregnancy and childhood (6-11 years), and health outcomes covering 4 health domains (mental, cardiometabolic, respiratory, allergy) during childhood (6-11 years) and adolescence (12-18 years).
name: Web application to query and download findings from exposome-outcome-wide association study
